entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
